ValidationRule.description: RFC Task Case requires resolution code and resolution comments when not closed successfully
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
OR( AND( RecordType.Name = 'PGi-Task Case', NOT(ISPICKVAL( Resolution_Code__c , "Successful")), isBlank(Resolution_Comments__c) ),
AND( RecordType.Name = 'PGi-Task Case', IsClosed, NOT(ISPICKVAL( Status, "Closed - Not Needed")), ISPICKVAL( Resolution_Code__c , "") ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You must enter a Resolution Code. If the Resolution Code is not Successful, you must enter Resolution Comments as well.
